quote: There was a super-8 steel town somewhere, where all the forgotten things in the cruel world ended up eventually, Mandy was sure of itâ€¦ this place, she decided, was called Smog City.
quote_letters: THERE WAS A SUPER-'8' STEEL TOWN SOMEWHERE WHERE ALL THE FORGOTTEN THINGS IN THE CRUEL WORLD ENDED UP EVENTUALLY MANDY WAS SURE OF IT THIS PLACE SHE DECIDED WAS CALLED SMOG CITY
